enumDescriptions: Open terminals manually using the command.
Automatically open terminals if there are multiple workspace folders.
Automatically open terminals, even if there is only one workspace folder.
workspace-terminals.auto.description: Open terminals on start and every time a workspace folder is added to the workspace

enumDescriptions: Switch terminals from other workspace terminals but not from terminals that weren't created by Workspace Terminals
Switch terminals when switching editors, even if the currently active terminal wasn't created by Workspace Terminals.
workspace-terminals.switchTerminal.description: Switch to the corresponding terminal when switching text editors.
